revised_title: On the Stereoscopic and Pseudoscopic Effects in the Camera Obscura
tldr: The author investigates the phenomenon of relief in images formed on the ground glass of the camera obscura and discovers that each eye perceives a different image, resulting in a stereoscopic effect. The author also explains the difference between stereoscopic and pseudoscopic effects and proposes a new method for constructing a stereoscope using a single image composed of two images with different perspectives.
